extension.description: THIS PROGRAM PROVIDES EASY ACCESS TO KOBRA XXX STREAMS AT THE CLICK OF A BUTTON
extension.disclaimer: KOBRA XXX STREAM DOES NOT ENDORSE ANY CONTENT PROVIDED BY ANY LINKED SITES, NOR DOES IT ASSUME ANY RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE INTERPRETATION OR ADD-ON OF ANY INFORMATION ORIGINATING FROM SUCH CONTENT. IN ADDITION, KODI IS A REGISTERED TRADEMARK OF THE XBMC FOUNDATION. WE ARE NOT CONNECTED TO OR IN ANY OTHER WAY AFFILIATED WITH KODI, TEAM KODI, OR THE XBMC FOUNDATION. ALL PRODUCT NAMES, LOGOS, AND BRANDS ARE PROPERTY OF THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS. ALL COMPANY, PRODUCT AND SERVICE NAMES USED IN THIS ADD-ON ARE FOR IDENTIFICATION PURPOSES ONLY. ALL ADD-ONS PROVIDED ARE FOR EDUCATIONAL USE ONLY AND WE TAKE NO RESPONSABILITY FOR ANY CONTENT VIEWED VIA THESE ADD-ONS. USE OF THESE NAMES, LOGOS, AND BRANDS DOES NOT IMPLY ENDORSEMENT. WE DO NOT ACCEPT RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE CAUSED BY THE USE OF ANY MATERIAL FROM THIS ADD-ON. WE RECOMMEND THAT USERS RE-CHECK ALL MATERIAL WITH THEIR OWN ANTI-VIRUS SOFTWARE. YOU MUST BE 18 OR OVER TO ACCESS THIS ADD-ON! THE MATERIALS AVAILABLE WITHIN THIS ADD-ON INCLUDE GRAPHIC VISUAL DEPICTIONS AND DESCRIPTIONS OF NUDITY AND SEXUAL ACTIVITY. BY USING THIS ADD-ON YOU AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING: 1. YOU ARE AN ADULT, AT LEAST 18 YEARS OF AGE, YOU ARE FAMILIAR WITH AND UNDERSTAND THE STANDARDS AND LAWS OF YOUR LOCAL COMMUNITY REGARDING SEXUALLY-ORIENTED MEDIA. YOU REPRESENT THAT, BASED ON YOUR FAMILIARITY WITH THE STANDARDS AND LAWS OF YOUR LOCAL COMMUNITY, YOU WILL NOT BE VIOLATING ANY APPLICABLE STANDARDS OR LAWS BY REQUESTING, RECEIVING, DOWNLOADING OR POSSESSING ANY OF THE VIDEO, AUDIO, GRAPHICS, IMAGES OR TEXT ADULT MATERIAL AVAILABLE ON THIS ADD-ON. 2. YOU HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT ANY USE OF THIS ADD-ON IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK. YOU UNDERSTAND THAT BY ACCEPTING THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, YOU ARE AGREEING TO HOLD THE PUBLISHER OF THIS ADD-ON HARMLESS FROM ANY RESPONSIBILITIES OR LIABILITIES RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THIS ADD-ON AND THE ADULT MATERIAL CONTAINED HEREIN. 3. YOU WILL NOT PERMIT ANY PERSON(S) UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE TO HAVE ACCESS TO ANY OF THE ADULT MATERIALS CONTAINED IN THIS ADD-ON. 4. YOU ARE VOLUNTARILY CHOOSING TO ACCESS THIS ADD-ON, BECAUSE YOU WANT TO VIEW, USE, READ OR HEAR THE VARIOUS APPS AND ADULT MATERIALS THAT ARE AVAILABLE. YOU AGREE TO IMMEDIATELY EXIT FROM THIS ADD-ON IF YOU ARE IN ANY WAY OFFENDED BY THE SEXUAL NATURE OF ANY ADULT MATERIAL. 5. IF YOU USE THIS ADD-ON IN VIOLATION OF THESE TERMS, OR USE THIS ADD-ON WHERE SUCH USE IS ILLEGAL, YOU MAY BE IN VIOLATION OF LOCAL AND/OR FEDERAL LAWS. YOU AGREE THAT YOU ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR USE OF THIS ADD-ON AND ANY LINKED THIRD PARTY WEB SITES, AND AGREE TO INDEMNIFY PUBLISHER AGAINST ANY CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF SUCH USE. 6. BY ENTERING THE ADD-ON, YOU AGREE TO ABIDE BY THE COMPLETE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE OF THIS ADD-ON.

extension.summary: Aeon Nox 5: Redux - Sự trở về
extension.description: Redux: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Redux: Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.

Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel. Added mods to original Aeon Nox skin by Kobra Builds. Also a big thanks to H24, OpenEleq and WhufLee. Thanks to Wendy Dunne and Mark Evans (KCB) for testing.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Redux: Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
Redux: Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redux : complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Redux: עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Redux: Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Redux: Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Redux: Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Redux: Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
Redux: 고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Redux: pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Redux: Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Redux: Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Redux: Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Redux: Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Redux: Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Redux: Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Redux: полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Redux: Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Redux: Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
Redux: การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Redux: Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
